title: [GAMEPLAY] I somehow killed my teammate

embed.description: League of Legends team kill. Twisted Fate somehow kills Gragas. Interestingly, the kill does not show up in the scoreboard but Syndra gets the assist and the kill shows up in the match history. Sorry about the low audio quality.

replies.body: It's related to Syndra's Scatter of the Weak (E). The moment she uses it, and someone dies, she won't get the kill and kill gold for it, but who was affected when  she hit her E.
Its because Syndra E made you and Gragas collide with each other, causing you to damage each other. There have been other posts about this too (dying from minions etc) about the bug in Syndras E
you're welcome btw for getting your view count so high (x post on reddit)

Patch 7.0

TF: New Passive. Cheating: TF can now cheat... ... ... what... he's a gambler. What did you expect?
Then syndra gets an assist on it xD
no kill no gold this needs to be patched
I had this happen once a good while ago, pretty sure I was playing Morde. I don't remember more beyond that.
